edu.iub.pubmed.graph

Class RelevanceGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iub.pubmed.graph.RelevanceGraph

  • public class RelevanceGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Graph with nodes for Papers and with CITED relationship to other papers Each node in the graph has three properties (PubmedId,Prior,Keywords) . This graph is used for calculating page rank scores .
    Author:
    Abhilash

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RelevanceGraph()
      Creates a new graph from the NEO4J_RELEVANCE_GRAPH_PATH location and creates index for pubmedId

      • createPaperNode

        org.neo4j.graphdb.Node createPaperNode(java.lang.String keyValue)
        Creates a new paper node for the given pubmedId if not present in the graph and sets the property Constants.PROPERTY_PUBMED_ID
        Parameters:
        keyValue - - new pubmed Id
        Returns:
        Node - graph node

      • updateGraph

        void updateGraph(java.lang.String pubmedId,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> citedPubmedIds,
               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> keyWords)
        Updates graph by creating a new node for the given pub med Id and new nodes if required for the citedPubmeds . For every new paper node created , three properties Constants.PROPERTY_PUBMED_ID,Constants.PROPERTY_KEYWORD, Constants.PRIOR
        Parameters:
        pubmedId - - new pubmed id
        citedPubmedIds - - list of cited pubmed Ids
        keyWords - - list of keywords

      • registerShutdownHook

        private static void registerShutdownHook(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService graphDb)
        Registers a shutdown hook for the Neo4j instance so that it shuts down nicely when the VM exits (even if you "Ctrl-C" the running application).
        Parameters:
        graphDb - - graphdatabase service object

      • removeNodes

        private void removeNodes()
        Removes nodes in the graph which doesn't have any keyword property
